title: Introducing: Vasser
content:
Eighteen year old Vasser wears his influences on the sleeves of his latest track, Whatever You Need, yet manages to meticulously conjure up a sound all his own.

The likes of Jamie XX, James Blake and Jon Hopkins all shine through on the shimmering, slightly dexterous production, whilst showcasing a knack for finding a killer hook. Check out Whatever You Need below.

Like this? Follow our On Repeat Playlist for a handpicked selection of the very best in new music; updated weekly.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
